splashscreen

Class SplashScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • splashscreen.SplashScreen

  • public class SplashScreen
extends java.lang.Object
    This class extends the Thread class and is used to run the splash screen of the game. Features of version 2.0: This entire class was created - the constructor assigns the JPanel that will be drawn on, and the run method is used to create and start the actual splash screen. Hours spent on this class: for coding: 15 min, for drawing, changing file format, etc.: 7.5 hours.
    Version:
    5.0, June 12, 2014
    Author:
    Salar Hosseini & Sophia Weng

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) javax.swing.JPanel panel
      This object reference variable to JPanel is used to store the JPanel that the splash screen will be displayed on.

      SplashScreen(javax.swing.JPanel panel2)
      This is the class constructor which will assign the proper JPanel value to the instance variable which is an object reference variable to JPanel.
